entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as saying that Gringotts is the safest place in the world for something you want to hide, except perhaps Hogwarts.

entities.name: gringotts
entities.description: Gringotts is mentioned as a safe place to hide something, and it's also the location of vault 713.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as thinking about what Hagrid said, and he realizes that he might have found out where the package from vault 713 was hidden.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as giving Harry something to think about while he's in bed.

entities.name: vault seven hundred and thirteen
entities.description: Vault 713 is mentioned as the location of a package that Harry thinks he might have found out where it was hidden.

relationships.description: Hagrid is mentioned as saying that Gringotts is the safest place in the world for something you want to hide, except perhaps Hogwarts.
Harry thinks he might have found out where the package from vault 713 was hidden.
